text: aagaah raho isamen shaq nahin ki jo log aasamaanon mein hain aur jo log zameen mein hai (garaz sab kuchh) khuda hee ke lie hai aur jo log khuda ko chhodakar (doosaron ko) pukaarate hain vah to (khuda ke pharzee) shareekon kee raah par bhee nahin chalate balki vah to sirph apanee atakal par chalate hain aur vah sirph vahamee aur khyaalee baaten kiya karate hain
